channel.title: 2020 on S. Verona Lišková
channel.description: Recent content in 2020 on S. Verona Lišková

item.title: Some Generalizations of Classical Integer Sequences Arising in Combinatorial Representation Theory
item.description: Abstract There exists a natural correspondence between the bases for a given finite-dimensional representation of a complex semisimple Lie algebra and a certain collection of finite edge-colored ranked posets, laid out by Donnelly, et al. in, for instance, [Donnelly 2003]. Robert G. Donnelly. Extremal properties of bases for representations of semisimple Lie algebras. Journal of Algebraic Combinatorics, 17, 2003. In this correspondence, the Serre relations on the Chevalley generators of the given Lie algebra are realized as conditions on coefficients assigned to poset edges.
